name: s
review: I like it. I put a little product on  my hand and use the pointy end of my bb to stipple it on and use the larger side to blend. It can give a natural to bang in your face glow

name: Kat
review: I like using this for everyday. It blends well n looks natural. I got the shade perla.

name: byrd
review: bought this in the color peach fuzz, or fizz? anyway, the color is gorgeous. It can be subtle, or very blinding. It's also beautiful underneath other highlighters. Planning on buying the shade Perla.

name: ambie
review: I got Oyster, it's great if you want a natural look! Super pretty

name: heathhvn
review: Great liquid highlighter.  Good pigmentation.  I bought one and as soon as I tried it bought another.  I use these for a body glow on my chest and shoulder.

name: Carly
review: I really liked this glow, it's not as popping as I thought it would be, but it's gorgeous for a natural glow. I like it for an everyday glow or even just on without any makeup looks really pretty

name: sconey
review: I really wanted to like this. It's a nice formula and seemed pigmented enough. But I felt misled because the images on the Anastasia Instagram showed the shade "Perla" being light enough for very fair skin, which is not the case. I am very fair and when I applied this to my face, in the light - yes it looked beautiful, but when the light shifted I was left with very obvious dark beige streaks on my cheeks. Sadly had to return. Wish they would have made a true white/pearl shade as this is more a champagne/golden shade and much to dark for fair skin.

name: CSanchezx3
review: I was really ecxited to use this product, it blends great with brush, you can also apply it with your finger. Its more fir a natural glow, not as pigmented as the glow kit pallettes.

name: Sydney
review: I was expecting more. Try pretty swatches but once you blend in the product, it's hardly there. I was expecting more from Anastasia.

name: johnnyfire
review: i really liked this, it was smooth over my foundation for a cream highlighter.  its very natural looking but I feel like I need to add a powder highlight over it to make it more intense, so I returned it.
